attributes.action: Get supermarket staff moved up the list for vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: To protect key workers who have been forgotten about
attributes.background: As supermarket staff we are in the heart of hundreds of people everyday. Some not adhering to social distancing rules and people not wearing masks. I believe we should not be at the bottom for the vaccination

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
